title: Person of Interest 2x6 Zoe Morgan
author: Tv Show & Coffee
comment: Zoe, Elias, and Scareface were the best recurring character on the show hands down.
I was hoping Zoe and John would connect. This was fav episode and it could've morphed over to a real relationship. Always good chem between them.
I loved this series to bits.Why they cancelled it is stupid.
He would have made a great Batman
It cracks me up how John moves "tactically" when they arrive in the burbs.  He's so on point only an idiot wouldn't see it.  Love this show and both of the actors.
